metadata.title: CVE-2021-33655 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
When sending malicous data to kernel by ioctl cmdFBIOPUT_VSCREENINFO,kernel will write memory out of bounds.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-33655` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-234-generic - 4.4.0-234.268
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-234-generic - 4.4.0-234.268
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-234-lowlatency - 4.4.0-234.268
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-193-generic - 4.15.0-193.204~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-193-generic - 4.15.0-193.204~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-193-lowlatency - 4.15.0-193.204~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1114-kvm - 4.4.0-1114.124
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1150-aws - 4.4.0-1150.165
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1141-aws - 4.15.0-1141.152~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1151-azure - 4.15.0-1151.166~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1136-gcp - 4.15.0-1136.152~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1106-oracle - 4.15.0-1106.117~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-234.268').
linux-hwe package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-193.204~16.04.1').
linux-kvm package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1114.124').
linux-aws package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1150.165').
linux-aws-hwe package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1141.152~16.04.1').
linux-azure package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1151.166~16.04.1').
linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.4.0-1083.90').
linux-gcp package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1136.152~16.04.1').
linux-gke: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-oracle package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1106.117~16.04.1').
linux-oem: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-raspi2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-snapdragon: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
